title: Under the Nullarbor
creator_credit: Ian Dunlop and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: An expedition to the remote Nullarbor Caves in the Nullabor Plain, an enormous limestone region. Describes the formation of the caves and explores an underground lake; studying fossils, archaeological remains of prehistoric human life, and insect and bird life.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Dunlop and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
